Description.Text: Adonis Strasbourg is a friendly 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Strasbourg. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, and a good location near Strasbourg train station and Strasbourg Cathedral. Strasbourg is a large city in the Alsace region that has historically vacillated between French and German authority. The medieval centre is known as the Grande Ile and classified as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Nearby places of interest include the Gothic Strasbourg Cathedral, the Musee Alsacien and the Petite-France neighbourhood, a serene collection of cobbled streets, medieval half-timbered houses and Baroque sandstone buildings. Local tram services provide fast and easy access to other popular Strasbourg destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, telephone, and an en-suite bathroom. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
